page.title: 08Tairmeibion Farm
page.content: A major feature of the farm is the large slurry tank.When the cows are in their shed in the winter,their excretion is cleared into the slurry pit.Which is then pumped into the slurry tank,which can hold up to 276,000 gallons,rain is allowed to mix there.This is then used in March to return the nutrients to the soil.The slurry is sprayed on using a 1500 gallon tanker and a 45 ft.boom.The field will be looked after in this way for 6_7 years until the grass production falls below the levels required.The field would then be reploughed and reseeded,with the addition of lime and fertilizers in order to obtain a better crop of grass.
